channel.title: Find chat?
channel.description:
Is there something to check for other people talking to you in RS?
Like if someone said "Hey", is there a command to reply to it?

item.title: Find chat?
item.dc:creator: @junior junior
item.description:
@junior wrote:

Do something like this.

if (InChat('hello')) then TypeSend('whats up');

Or you can use

if (InchatMulti('hel', 'ell', 'llo')) then TypeSend('whats up');

This will just give you an idea. There are also other procedures/functions that you can use to detect chat in the chat box, have a look at the SRL manual.

Read full topic
